actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide that a retired annuitant may elect to be subject to a system of deductions from his annuity on account of outside earnings instead of being subject to the prohibition against returning to the service of his last employer.

summary.text: Allows under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 a retired annuitant to elect to be subject to a system of deductions from his annuity on account of outside earnings in lieu of being subject to the prohibition against returning to the service of his last employer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide that a retired annuitant may elect to be subject to a system of deductions from his annuity on account of outside earnings instead of being subject to the prohibition against returning to the service of his last employer.
